I_lovely_hearts.name: 美丽的心
I_lovely_hearts.memory: 如果我们能够看到爱，那会是什么样的呢？我想象着成百上千的爱心从一个扎拉登那里飞向另一个。这会在所有人之间交织成无尽的爱心之网。但我仍会遐想...我会被连接在上面吗？

I_tiny_wings.name: 小小翅膀
I_tiny_wings.memory: As I look up to the sky,|L|I wish I knew just how to fly.|L|Tiny wings,|L|Little things.|L|I look up from where I sit,|L|I belong in this here pit.

I_starry_night.name: 繁星之夜
I_starry_night.memory: The stars fly higher than any Zaraden could ever reach. I can't fly like other Zaraden, but... why did they leave me down here?
I_starry_night.card: 星星子弹！|L|保持不动以提高射速

I_small_mushroom.name: 小蘑菇
I_small_mushroom.memory: This little glowing mushroom grows in all the caves around here. They are very tasty and fill me with so much energy. After eating one, I can see my veins glowing the same color for a little while.

I_orb_mushroom.name: 球状蘑菇
I_orb_mushroom.memory: These are so cute! They look like a little spring.|L||L|I can't tell you how many times a quick mite has snatched one of these right out of my hands. They must really love these mushrooms.

I_flat_mushroom.name: 平顶蘑菇
I_flat_mushroom.memory: These are very tasty, but I can't bring myself to pick them anymore. They shelter so many little mites from the rain. I can't take that away from them!

I_quick_mite.name: 快腿跳虫
I_quick_mite.memory: These quick little bugs run so fast and try so hard to stay out of sight. I actually thought they were just a blur until I finally saw one standing still. It vanished the instant it saw me.

I_fang.name: 尖牙
I_fang.memory: By the time your last baby fang falls out, you should be able to fly, but I could not...

I_glass_fang.name: 玻璃尖牙
I_glass_fang.memory: Ouch!|L|Did I just step on a Glass Flora thorn?|L||L|Hmm... This looks more like a tooth!

I_star_flower.name: 星之花
I_star_flower.memory: 你想和我一起看星星吗？|L||L|太棒了！今晚迟些时候我会再溜回来的！我刚刚看到一个景色绝佳的地方。|L||L|我有一本书，里面有着所有古老的星座。我们看看能找到多少吧！
I_star_flower.card: 光耀防御+[VAL1]|L|总伤害+[VAL2]%|L|每点光耀防御

I_crescent.name: 新月
I_crescent.memory: The crescent shape and void have been synonymous ever since this constellation was named. See how the gap in the crescent has no stars shining through it? It's the largest area with no stars in the whole sky. It's unnerving to think about how much empty space that is.
I_crescent.card: 虚空防御+[VAL1]|L|总伤害+[VAL2]%|L|每点虚空防御

I_magma_worm.name: 熔岩虫
I_magma_worm.memory: As the legend goes, a giant magma worm would flail violently deep inside of Mount Retina. This would cause all the earthquakes in the days leading up to an eruption of the volcano.|L||L|It hasn't erupted for over a hundred years, but I remember my mother told me that when she was little, she heard the same blast twice from right here! The sound went around the whole planet twice!
I_magma_worm.card: 燃烧防御+[VAL1]|L|总伤害+[VAL2]%|L|每点燃烧防御

I_sky_guardian.name: 天空守卫
I_sky_guardian.memory: That one was supposedly the source of lightning during a storm. Rayo the Sky Guardian would hide in the clouds and shoot lightning from her tail. The thunder was the sound of her wings flapping, so you would hate her!|L||L|Hehehe, I know you could never hate anything.
I_sky_guardian.card: 电击防御+[VAL1]|L|总伤害+[VAL2]%|L|每点电击防御

I_hydra_plant.name: 蛇头兰
I_hydra_plant.memory: This one was said to be a massive hydra plant that lived on the Hyren continent. She was able to extend her body hundreds of liradra into the sky, but that's probably exaggerated. She is supposedly the mother of all the hydra plants in the world today.|L||L|If you think the trees are tall here, you should see the ones on Hyren!|L|Hmm, maybe her height was accurate.
I_hydra_plant.card: 毒素防御+[VAL1]|L|总伤害+[VAL2]%|L|每点毒素防御

I_big_mushroom.name: 大蘑菇
I_big_mushroom.memory: These mushrooms are amazing, but very rare. Just one bite and I feel twice as tall!|L||L|Imagine the hugs that I could give!
I_big_mushroom.card: 最大生命+[VAL1]|L|总伤害+[VAL3]%|L|更大子弹

I_thin_mushroom.name: 细瘦蘑菇
I_thin_mushroom.memory: These are very tasty, but no matter how many you eat, you will never feel full.
I_thin_mushroom.card: 最大生命+[VAL1]|L|不回复|L|连击时间增加

I_halo.name: 光环
I_halo.memory: I'm so lucky my sister comes down to see me so often. Even if she has to do it in secret, she still makes time for me.

I_saw_bloom.name: 锯之华
I_saw_bloom.memory: Meerstalks are segmented reptiles that live all throughout The Pit. They are normally docile creatures, but not the Guardian meerstalk. She uses this rare and dangerous flower as a weapon and she has quite the temper. Her name is Roundsaw for a reason.

I_determination.name: 决心
I_determination.memory: I've heard that if you just YELL as loud as possible for as long as possible, then you will get stronger. Through sheer willpower alone, you can do absolutely anything! You can even change the COLOR of your HAIR!
I_determination.card: 总伤害+[VAL1]%|L|每点防御单元|L|（最小+25%）

I_painting.name: 画作
I_painting.memory: I saw that quirky wingless girl again. She loves to paint things, so I asked her if she would make a painting of me.|L|...I'm really glad I met her when I did.|L||L|Oh no! How am I going to explain where I got this? I don't want to hide it!
I_painting.card: 每场战斗可承受一次|L|致命攻击

I_bandage.name: 绷带
I_bandage.memory: Just keep it held together. That's the best you can do. Don't let the cracks get any bigger.
I_bandage.card: 受击后无敌时间增长|L|回复[VAL2]%

I_fear_sense.name: 感知恐惧
I_fear_sense.memory: They always told me to be afraid of the monsters. Monsters are evil creatures that will kill us if they get the chance. But this shows me that they are actually afraid of us. Their base level fear of us absolutely dwarfs a Zaraden's capacity to even experience fear!
I_fear_sense.card: 显示恐惧|L|展示一个额外怪物

I_plant_glyph.name: 植物符文
I_plant_glyph.card: 毒素光环|L|需在战斗中经过一段|L|时间

I_spark_thorns.name: 电弧棘刺
I_spark_thorns.memory: Vitrea was so excited about one of my paintings. She went on about some numbers where the ratio between them was equal to the ratio between their sum and the bigger number. I have no idea what she's talking about, but I'm just happy that something I painted can get her to be so enthusiastic.

I_glass_petal.name: 玻璃花瓣
I_glass_petal.memory: I found such a lovely flower petal on the ground. I picked it up thinking that it would be soft and smooth, but it had a sharp crack on it. I dropped it after it cut my finger and it shattered on the ground. Every piece had lost its beautiful color.
I_glass_petal.card: 总伤害+20%|L|直至受伤|L|（每场战斗重置）

I_the_world.name: 世界
I_the_world.memory: She taught me that Eyeris was the name of our planet. We live on the Iiry continent. There are actually 4 other continents across the ocean and we can't see them from here because the world is round like a ball! She says that there is a mountain on the continent of Retina that is so tall, you can actually see it from the top of the towers! I wish I could see it.
I_the_world.card: 连击时间增加|L|全连击回复[VAL2]生命

I_boundless.name: 无垠
I_boundless.memory: If there are really an infinite number of universes, then everything that you have ever imagined must actually exist somewhere among them!|L||L|I'd sure hate to live there.
I_boundless.card: 你可以穿过屏幕边缘|L|并传送到另一端

I_link_synapse.name: 连接突触
I_link_synapse.memory: Link Synapses are relatively weak. They only work in one direction and they are confined to a single timeline thread. Still, a Shamble with this power can send objects to any point in time and space causing duplicate instances to exist. Some Shambles can even decide, retroactively, that they never actually sent an object through the synapse. That instance of the object is erased from existence, but the original will always remain.
I_link_synapse.card: 你的子弹能够传送回|L|屏幕的另一端

I_little_sister.name: 妹妹
I_little_sister.memory: I found two groups of stars that each make the shape of a heart. One is smaller than the other and they are right next to each other. I named them Little Sister and Big Sister.|L||L|I wonder if I have any sisters.

I_revita_heart.name: 轮回之心
I_revita_heart.memory: You've been through so much pain, but now look at all that you've gained!
I_revita_heart.card: 受伤时回复|L|并获得临时力量

I_denial.name: 否认
I_denial.memory: Those glyphy girls are just words. They can't possibly hurt me! I mean, how could they? Just a bunch of silly words.
I_denial.card: 阻挡每场战斗的|L|第一次受击

I_anxiety.name: 焦虑
I_anxiety.memory: I don't know why these machines were built. Their programming is incredibly difficult to decipher. All I know for sure is that they were left down here after the towers were built so long ago.

I_insecurity.name: 不安
I_insecurity.memory: Those flowers are so fragile. For every chip or crack they endure, they become even easier to break the next time.|L||L|It's nothing a little love and care can't fix.
I_insecurity.card: 受到伤害后|L|总伤害+25%|L|（每场战斗重置）

I_loneliness.name: 孤独
I_loneliness.memory: They knew I was alone. I still remember all those eyes staring at me. They knew I was defective!
I_loneliness.card: 受到伤害后|L|发散虚空光环

I_big_sister.name: 姐姐
I_big_sister.memory: I have not seen the starry sisters in a long time. I haven't even seen any stars in a long time. I miss them so much.
I_big_sister.card: 生命与连击护盾|L|能够再生

I_self_portrait.name: 自画像
I_self_portrait.memory: Her pale body is like a blank canvas. We want to slather her with paint. We just want to envelop her entire being with our colors.|L||L|That cutie makes us feel so beautiful. We just want to return the favor.
I_self_portrait.card: 每场战斗可承受|L|[VAL1]次致命攻击！|L|总伤害+[VAL3]%

I_second_form.name: 第二形态
I_second_form.memory: And when you think that you've finally got me, I'll just get up again. I'll be stronger than ever before!|L||L|Every! Single! Time!

I_zesty_drink.name: 美味饮料
I_zesty_drink.memory: I love this drink! I don't know what it is, but it makes me feel like I could really fly all on my own!

I_lucky_flower.name: 幸运花朵
I_lucky_flower.memory: I love these flowers!|L|They glow in the dark so I can always find them at night. I can use the glowing liquid from the stem to light up my home. The petals come in all colors and they can be used to create beautiful paint.

I_super_zesty.name: 超能饮料
I_super_zesty.memory: Of all the things I miss from my life up there, I think I miss this drink the most. It makes me feel like I could rip out the heart of my enemies, hold their still beating heart in front of their own eyes, and then just give it all the love and attention that it deserves!|L|Yeah! It's pretty good.
I_super_zesty.card: 每场战斗后|L|回复[VAL1]生命|L|总伤害+[VAL3]%

I_blue_zest.name: 蓝色饮料
I_blue_zest.memory: One of the best things I've ever tasted! If blue had a flavor, this would be it.
I_blue_zest.card: 每场战斗后|L|获得[VAL1]后备生命

I_twin_flowers.name: 双生花
I_twin_flowers.memory: We found these two glowy flowers right next to each other. They were the same colors as both of our hair.|L|We made that into our special place. No monsters would ever find us there, but I think she was dealing with a completely different kind of monster.

I_dread.name: 恐惧
I_dread.memory: I know that feeling will be back,|L|I never know when it will be,|L|It strikes so suddenly,|L|It cannot be controlled,|L|I dread it every moment.|L||L|The monster no one else can see,|L|Until I show it to them.
I_dread.card: 每场战斗后|L|获得一个恐慌

I_drip_paint.name: 滴落涂鸦
I_drip_paint.memory: And this one, I painted with my own blood.|L||L|Just kidding!|L|...Or am I?|L||L|Nah, it's actually your blood.|L||L|(She's laughing at my jokes!)

I_color_glyph.name: 色彩符文
I_color_glyph.memory: |C3||den| (Den)|C0||L|My favorite glyph. It means colors and I love colors. Just attach any glyphs and you get a different color. I wonder if words change the way we see colors or if colors change the way that we think of words.

I_masterpiece.name: 杰作
I_masterpiece.memory: Chaos is flawless.|L|There is no way to find a flaw in chaos, so go ahead and embrace it!
I_masterpiece.card: 每场战斗后|L|获得随机奖励效果

I_shame.name: 羞愧
I_shame.memory: We're not real. We're a liar!
I_shame.card: 受到伤害后|L|最大生命+2|L|（每场战斗一次）

I_frustration.name: 沮丧
I_frustration.memory: I'm really starting to like those Guardians. They want to evolve beyond the limits of their own kind, so they become huge monsters ready to fight anything in their way! Ha, they are tough like me!
I_frustration.card: 每次受到伤害时|L|力量增长

I_heart_key.name: 心型钥匙
I_heart_key.memory: I want to tell you things. I want to give you things. But it is so difficult for me to be sincere.|L|It's terrifying to feel so vulnerable, so I lock up my true feelings and throw away the key.
I_heart_key.card: 所有挑战更简单|L|且给予额外力量

I_adamant_will.name: 不屈意志
I_adamant_will.memory: You think it's that easy to break me? I'll use whatever makeshift parts needed to put myself back together! You can't stop me!

I_heart_candy.name: 心型糖果
I_heart_candy.memory: It was the sweetest thing I ever tasted! She brought me one every time she came to see me. She asked me if I wanted a whole bag, but I said no. I wanted to keep them special. Only one for every time I saw her.

I_love_paint.name: 爱之颜料
I_love_paint.memory: These colors radiate light right off the page! They want to share that light with your eyes.

I_dark_paint.name: 暗色颜料
I_dark_paint.memory: These colors keep most of the light to themselves. They must be very lonely.

I_warm_paint.name: 温暖颜料
I_warm_paint.memory: These colors seem to make the page feel warmer.

I_bright_paint.name: 闪亮颜料
I_bright_paint.memory: Together, these colors seem to glow brighter.

I_murky_paint.name: 浑浊颜料
I_murky_paint.memory: Most Zaraden don't like these dull colors. I think they need love too.

I_warm_art.name: 温暖画作
I_warm_art.memory: What was this first one again?|L|Oh!|L||C3||teh| (Teh) |soh| (Soh)|C0||L|That's warmth!

I_gloomy_art.name: 灰暗画作
I_gloomy_art.memory: I'm ready for this one!|L||C3||nu| (Nu) |teh| (Teh) |den| (Den)|C0||L|Gloom? I don't know that word.

I_glass_glyph.name: 玻璃符文
I_glass_glyph.card: 生命未满开始战斗时|L|获得玻璃之心

I_metal_glyph.name: 金属符文
I_metal_glyph.memory: |C3||kah| (Kah)|C0||L|Oh yes, bring on the metal!|L||C3||sin||kah||-||sin||lin| (Synkah Synlin)|C0||L|That's heavy metal music, baby!|L|Oh yeah, I'll teach you more words.|L||C3||kah||yo||ren| (kayoren) |C0|Wire|L||C3||sin||la||kah| (Sinlakah) |C0|Drum|L||C3||ah||soh||kah| (Ahsokah) |C0|Engine
I_metal_glyph.card: 全连击时|L|获得一层护盾|L|全防御+[VAL2]

I_body_glyph.name: 身体符文
I_body_glyph.memory: This one has so many uses. Attach it to other glyphs to get feelings, emotions, or verbs.|L||C3||soh||ze| (Sohze) |C0|Anger|L||C3||ze||soh| (Zeesoh) |C0|To burn|L||C3||xai||ze| (Xaize) |C0|Joy|L||C3||ze||xai| (Zexai) |C0|To lighten|L||C3||ze||lu| (Zeelu) |C0|Fall in love|L||C3||ze||ris| (Zeris) |C0|To fly
I_body_glyph.card: 可残存1生命|L|承受[VAL1]次致命伤害|L|最大生命+[VAL3]

I_transfusion.name: 输血
I_transfusion.memory: Our hearts are linked together.|L|It's keeping me alive.|L|But I'm so very scared,|L|If they become detached,|L|Can I even survive?

I_heart_cookie.name: 心型饼干
I_heart_cookie.memory: On very rare occasions, she would bring me one of these cookies. She said that she made them herself. I would joke that I would help her make the next batch, but deep down I knew... I would never be allowed up there.

I_suture.name: 缝合
I_suture.memory: I wish I wasn't so used to fixing this broken heart. I'm very good at it now, but it feels more and more hollow each time.|L||L|I know it will get better.

I_blot_of_paint.name: 一团颜料
I_blot_of_paint.memory: We love our new colors.|L|We love them so much.|L|Why were we afraid to show them?|L|Why did we keep them a secret?|L|No more!|L|Everyone deserves the colors!

I_heart_tank.name: 心之容器
I_heart_tank.memory: Green Status: 8% - Normal|L|Red Status: 8% - Normal|L|Yellow Status: 8% - Normal|L|Blue Status: 8% - Normal|L|Orange Status: 8% - Normal|L|Purple Status: 59% - Critical|L|Anomalous: 1% - Critical|L|Status: Defective|L||L|//Subject has expressed desire for physical contact.
I_heart_tank.card: 全防御+[VAL1]|L|最大生命+[VAL6]|L|全回复

I_sour_candy.name: 酸味糖果
I_sour_candy.memory: This candy tastes like a cluster of 100 sour fruits all at once! I can only handle that kind of shock every once in a while, but I still love them.|L||L|She said that she's going to bring me a bunch of different candies to try. Knowing her, it will probably be a bunch of weird flavors that she is too scared to try first.

I_scissors.name: 剪刀
I_scissors.memory: Intrusive thoughts. I am nowhere near those scissors, but I still can't help but imagine every possible way they could hurt me.

I_tower.name: 塔
I_tower.memory: "A Zaraden afraid of heights? That's the most ridiculous thing I've ever heard," they say. Of course, I should note that THEY can fly without any help.

I_thunder.name: 雷鸣
I_thunder.memory: It's just so loud and sudden. I hide in the corner until it passes. I hold my antennae so tight, hoping they won't pick up those awful vibrations.

I_light_glyph.name: 光耀符文
I_light_glyph.card: 光耀恐慌|L|光耀防御+[VAL2]|L|+[VAL3]恐慌

I_void_glyph.name: 虚空符文
I_void_glyph.card: 虚空恐慌|L|虚空防御+[VAL2]|L|+[VAL3]恐慌

I_fire_glyph.name: 火焰符文
I_fire_glyph.card: 燃烧恐慌|L|燃烧防御+[VAL2]|L|+[VAL3]恐慌

I_energy_glyph.name: 能量符文
I_energy_glyph.card: 电击恐慌|L|电击防御+[VAL2]|L|+[VAL3]恐慌

I_natural_glyph.name: 自然符文
I_natural_glyph.card: 毒素恐慌|L|毒素防御+[VAL2]|L|+[VAL3]恐慌

I_poison_mushroom.name: 毒蘑菇
I_poison_mushroom.memory: No! You don't want to try that one. Trust me. I've tried it before.

I_broken_glass.name: 破碎玻璃
I_broken_glass.memory: Intrusive thoughts. A random occurrence will cause this glass to break suddenly. All of the pieces will come flying at me.

I_forest.name: 森林
I_forest.memory: I can't wait for my wings to grow! I'm gunna fly so high up!|L||L|How much more do I have to wait Mommy?

I_squall.name: 飓风
I_squall.memory: These storms come and go so fast, but they are absolutely terrifying while they last.

I_embrace.name: 拥抱
I_embrace.memory: She promised me 10,000 hours of accumulated hugs. She was always good at keeping track of things. I wonder if we really even made it to 1 hour.
I_embrace.card: 更小恐慌|L|恐慌伤害+[VAL1]|L|+[VAL4]恐慌

I_entropy.name: 熵
I_entropy.memory: Nothing terrifies me more than the fact that the whole universe is tending towards an endless expanse of stillness. All matter frozen at the same temperature.|L|But then I remember that something caused this universe to exist right now. It could happen again.
I_entropy.card: 没有恐慌时|L|会生成一个恐慌

I_phobia.name: 恐惧症
I_phobia.memory: you will dIe alone|L|nobody even Likes you|L|yOu will die alone|L|nobody eVen likes you|L|you will die alonE|L|nobody even likes YOU|L||shake|HahAhaHaAhaHA

I_bloody_nails.name: 染血指甲
I_bloody_nails.memory: She noticed the cuts on my fingers. I told her that I fell and scraped them, but I know she didn't believe that. I just don't want her to worry.|L||L|I bite them so hard when I get nervous. Without even realizing it, I bite them until they bleed.

I_pebble.name: 卵石
I_pebble.memory: A sudden sharp pain in the back of my head. I turn around and find this shiny pebble on the floor. Two giggling Zaraden fly over me.|L|"She is just a wingless. It doesn't matter."|L|I kept that rock. It's a very pretty rock.

I_blank_canvas.name: 空白画布
I_blank_canvas.memory: There is nothing on this page, but I can't wait to change that!

I_spring_mushroom.name: 弹簧蘑菇
I_spring_mushroom.memory: Another type of cute spring mushroom!|L||L|These ones vibrate all the time. If you listen closely, you can hear them humming.

I_energy_tank.name: 能量容器
I_energy_tank.memory: We are running out of purple tetrids yet again. How is it that we always have the other five in consistent quantities?

I_sun_stone.name: 日之石
I_sun_stone.memory: Why are you all looking at me? What do you want from me? Did I do something wrong?!|L||L|You expect too much from me...|L|Stop looking at me!
I_sun_stone.card: 充能速率+[VAL1]%|L|揭示一个|L|额外怪物选择

I_sweet_fruit.name: 甜味果实
I_sweet_fruit.memory: This fruit is so juicy and sweet. It is my favorite fruit, but it only grows high up in the trees. I can only get the ones that fall to the ground ...unless the aviocs get to it first.
I_sweet_fruit.card: 光耀蓄力|L|蓄力伤害+[VAL2]%|L|最大生命+[VAL3]

I_dry_fruit.name: 干硬果实
I_dry_fruit.memory: This fruit is dry and crunchy. The inside is mostly hollow and it has absolutely no flavor. Unfortunately, this is the most common fruit I can get.
I_dry_fruit.card: 虚空蓄力|L|蓄力伤害+[VAL2]%|L|受击无敌增长

I_spicy_fruit.name: 辣味果实
I_spicy_fruit.memory: This fruit tastes like it was on fire! My eyes start stinging just by being near it! I can't handle this one.
I_spicy_fruit.card: 燃烧蓄力|L|充能速率+[VAL2]%|L|受击无敌增长

I_sour_fruit.name: 酸味果实
I_sour_fruit.memory: This fruit grows in little clusters. Every time I bite one, I feel like my face is going to collapse into itself. They are actually quite tasty once you get over the initial shock.|L||L|I bet these could even get Pearl to make a funny face!
I_sour_fruit.card: 电击蓄力|L|充能速率+[VAL2]%|L|最大生命+[VAL3]

I_bitter_fruit.name: 苦味果实
I_bitter_fruit.memory: This fruit tastes exactly like the grass around here. It's not very good to eat, but I can use it in my paints.
I_bitter_fruit.card: 毒素蓄力|L|蓄力伤害+[VAL2]%|L|最大生命+[VAL3]

I_fungal_spark.name: 电弧真菌
I_fungal_spark.memory: Ouch!|L|Okay! Don't actually touch the yellow springy ones, especially when they are close together.|L||L|Joule would probably love these!
I_fungal_spark.card: 最大生命+[VAL1]|L|最大能量+[VAL3]|L|充能速率+[VAL5]%

I_reserve_tank.name: 备用容器
I_reserve_tank.memory: I can't stress enough the importance of a backup plan.|L||L|If my holowings were to run out of energy while I am high above the ground, that would be very bad for me. If all my backups fail, I can only hope the sheer terror of falling would keep them powered long enough to drift down safely.

I_energy_zest.name: 能量饮料
I_energy_zest.memory: It's probably a good thing that I can't get ahold of these anymore. Sure, they are great for a full night of writing music, but terrible for the next day.
I_energy_zest.card: 满溢的额外能量！|L|蓄力伤害+[VAL3]%

I_love_signal.name: 爱的信标
I_love_signal.memory: This signal confirms it! There is life beyond this universe. They are right here! They are right next to us, and yet so far away!|L||L|Those Shambles might never know how much they've truly helped me.
I_love_signal.card: 蓄力射击|L|吸引基础子弹

I_puncture.name: 针孔
I_puncture.memory: When you love someone, it's like they poked a tiny hole in your heart and now all the love is leaking out. Sometimes, it can be embarrassing, but do you really want to patch it up?
I_puncture.card: 蓄力时以一半射速|L|发射基础子弹

I_paint_brush.name: 笔刷
I_paint_brush.memory: Zaraden come in every possible combination of colors. Most Zaraden are drawn to things of their own two colors. Everything from their favorite food to their love partner will have at least one of their colors. My hair is pink, but I was born with the rarest skin color, NONE. I get to love all colors equally. Lucky me!
I_paint_brush.card: 蓄力更久|L|以使用暴击蓄力！|L|连击时间增加

I_heartbeat.name: 心跳
I_heartbeat.memory: //Unit-99 is activated for the first time|L|Fear Rating: 6,791|L||L|//Name, Lulu, assigned to Unit-99|L|Assigned by: Lutekna|L|Fear Rating: 734|L||L|//Heartbeat.prog initialized|L|//Unit Lulu experienced a sudden rise in temperature|L|Fear Rating: 0
I_heartbeat.card: 最大能量+[VAL1]|L|充能速率+[VAL3]%|L|更快蓄力

I_thorns.name: 棘刺
I_thorns.memory: My heart can't be broken if I never let anyone touch it!

I_love_note.name: 爱的纸条
I_love_note.memory: I found this crumpled note down here. It said "I Love You" with a heart next to it. I don't know how it ended up down here, and I wonder if it was ever delivered. I think about what it would be like to give this to someone and my heart starts to beat faster.

I_blood_flow.name: 血流
I_blood_flow.memory: The love noodles are a very important organ. When your heart beats, it pumps all of the love fluid through your love noodles. This ensures that none of your other organs ever feel lonely. This is vital to staying alive.

I_paper_cut.name: 纸割
I_paper_cut.memory: I got a paper cut! This is truly what it means to suffer for your art.

I_double_time.name: 二倍速
I_double_time.memory: When the music goes into double time, I can feel my heart beat faster. I get so excited, I just want to break something! But in a good way, you know?
I_double_time.card: 心心射速+[VAL1]|L|子弹速度+[VAL2]|L|移动速度+[VAL3]

I_glowing.name: 光亮
I_glowing.memory: A critical hug!|L||L|A surprise hug that occurs at the moment when you need it most. It deals extra love per second.

I_icy.name: 冰冷
I_icy.memory: It's so cold...|L|Let's warm up together.

I_warmth.name: 温暖
I_warmth.memory: Veyerals are so freezing cold that even fire won't warm them up. I've seen them rolling around in actual fire. The fire was just absorbed into their body. They looked so disappointed.

I_sparky.name: 活力
I_sparky.memory: I made a friend, and she has wings, and they're so pretty, and I am so excited to see her again!
I_sparky.card: 电击防御+[VAL1]|L|心心射速+[VAL2]|L|子弹速度+[VAL3]

I_illness.name: 疾病
I_illness.memory: I'll hug you and make you feel all better.|L|Oh no! Now I'm sick too!|L|Oh well. We might as well keep hugging then.
I_illness.card: 毒素防御+[VAL1]|L|心心暴击伤害+[VAL2]%

I_acute_heart.name: 敏锐的心
I_acute_heart.memory: It's just so strange to me. She really seemed to love everything.|L||L|One day, we found a dead mite on the ground. Within seconds, she was sobbing as if she had known that little creature her entire life. She held it in her arms and tried to kiss it back to life...

I_anchor.name: 锚
I_anchor.memory: I will always be a wingless to them. Even though I found my own way to fly. I created something that could change the lives of all wingless. We could all be the same, but it doesn't matter. We will always be wingless to them.
I_anchor.card: 心心随你一起移动|L|心心射速+[VAL2]

I_sine_wave.name: 正弦波
I_sine_wave.memory: Such beautiful patterns can be described with nothing but numbers. Our whole universe can be modeled with numbers. Truly fascinating!

I_cracked_heart.name: 碎裂的心
I_cracked_heart.memory: I wonder who this one belonged to.|L|It's so cold now. It must have been here for a very long time.|L||L|It's too late to help her now...

I_acute_shot.name: 敏锐射击
I_acute_shot.memory: She always knew exactly what to say to make me feel better. I just wish I could figure out how to do the same for her, but I'm no good at it. I don't know how she could love everything so much.|L||L|Everything but herself...

I_pressure.name: 压力
I_pressure.memory: Ah! Remembering even the simplest things is so difficult when I'm under pressure!

I_ripple_effect.name: 涟漪效应
I_ripple_effect.memory: I overheard yet another Zaraden talking about the same dream. An odd zaranoid creature was talking to her. It was impossible to make out the details of its form and it spoke with random noises. This has to be the same being that I saw. It's connecting with random Zaraden through their dreams, but not in the same way that any known monster would.|L||L|This is very exciting!
I_ripple_effect.card: 分裂心心+[VAL1]|L|心心伤害+[VAL3]|L|暴击率+[VAL3]%

I_love_mite.name: 爱的跳虫
I_love_mite.memory: They say that the sting of a love mite feels exactly like being in love. One of these stung me and all I got was uncontrollable nausea and vivid hallucinations!
I_love_mite.card: 分散射击|L|心心射速+[VAL2]|L|+[VAL3]恐慌

I_reflection.name: 映像
I_reflection.memory: We were so very different, but I saw so much of myself in her. Those are just memories now. I can never see her again.

I_another_heart.name: 另一颗心
I_another_heart.memory: What would happen if you really gave your heart away when you fell in love? Ideally, everyone would get one back. In reality, some would have many, and many would have none.

I_pile_of_hearts.name: 成堆的心
I_pile_of_hearts.memory: You have all this love to give and you forgot how to express it? Let me remind you how!

I_rhythm.name: 节奏
I_rhythm.memory: Isn't it strange that sound waves bouncing off of your antennae in very specific patterns can make you cry?|L||L|Hey, don't look at me like that! I know music has made you cry a bunch of times.
I_rhythm.card: 心心暴击率|L|及暴击伤害+[VAL1]%

I_mote_bulb.name: 尘粒灯泡
I_mote_bulb.memory: //Unit-07 is activated after 78,022 days|L|Fear Rating: 93,041|L||L|//Name, Split Unit, assigned to Unit-07|L|Assigned by: Lutekna|L|[Name assignment rejected]|L|//Critical error in Weapon Systems|L|Fear Rating: 97,236|L||L|[Activating distress signal]|L|//Reply received from Unit-08

I_vacuum_tube.name: 真空管
I_vacuum_tube.memory: [Distress signal received]|L|Sender: Unit-07|L|//Unit-08 is activated after 78,022 days|L|Fear Rating: 94,734|L||L|[Message from Unit-07]|L|//Attack hostile Zaraden, Lutekna|L||L|//Critical error in Weapon Systems|L|Fear Rating: 102,487

I_heat_coil.name: 加热线圈
I_heat_coil.memory: [Open Shell]|L|//Prisma has received affection|L|Donated by: Wingless Zaraden|L|Fear Rating: 0|L||L|//Prisma is vulnerable|L|//Temperature Warning!|L|Fear Rating: 761|L||L|//Temperature Warning!|L|//Temperature Warning!|L|[Close Shell]

I_circuitry.name: 电路
I_circuitry.memory: [Distress signal received]|L|Sender: Syncron-03|L|//Intruder detected|L|//Potential tower zone-5169|L|//One unidentified Zaraden|L||L|[Activating distress signal]|L|//Reply received from Syncron-01|L|//Reply received from Syncron-04|L|[Activating Panic Mode]|L|//Do not let her enter

I_chemical_light.name: 化学灯
I_chemical_light.memory: //Heart Drive access is locked|L|//Sentinel Model 4X requires a password|L|Enter Password: |ai||lu||ai||L|//Incorrect password|L|Enter Password: |ai||lu||ai||L|//Incorrect password|L|Enter Password: |ai||lu||ai||L|//.............Error|L||L|//Password Accepted|L|[Heart Drive Unlocked]

I_love.name: 爱
I_love.memory: It is simple.|L|It is lovely.|L|It is awful.|L|It is wonderful.|L||wave|It feels like every color all at once!
I_love.card: 光耀之心|L|心心伤害+[VAL2]|L|暴击率+[VAL3]%

I_apathy.name: 冷漠
I_apathy.memory: Sometimes, I just don't care enough to even finish this...
I_apathy.card: 虚空之心|L|心心伤害+[VAL2]|L|受击无敌增长

I_passion.name: 热情
I_passion.memory: Sometimes, I just don't know when to stop. My heart is on fire and I never want it to go out!
I_passion.card: 燃烧之心|L|心心伤害+[VAL2]|L|心心射速+[VAL3]

I_elation.name: 欢欣
I_elation.memory: She had actually come back to see me! My heart was electric!
I_elation.card: 电击之心|L|心心射速+[VAL2]|L|子弹速度+[VAL3]

I_desire.name: 欲望
I_desire.memory: Sometimes, I want something so much, it takes over my every thought. That's when it begins to poison my heart.
I_desire.card: 毒素之心|L|暴击率+[VAL2]%|L|暴击伤害+[VAL3]%

I_everything.name: 一切
I_everything.memory: The Void says that she cannot feel love, but I saw all of those hearts inside her. She has so many hearts. I know they can feel love. Every heart can feel loved.
I_everything.card: 心形子弹|L|变为各种元素！|L|心心射速+[VAL2]

I_cutter.name: 羽刀
I_cutter.memory: She told me they were used in something called a war. Thousands of Zaraden would kill each other with these THINGS just because someone told them to! It was so horrible to think about and it haunted me for days. She assured me that there haven't been any wars for hundreds of years.

I_drumsticks.name: 鼓棒
I_drumsticks.memory: I love these things! I can make music just by hitting things with them! And best of all, there is no one around to complain about it...

I_glow_mite.name: 发光跳虫
I_glow_mite.memory: These bugs are very pretty, but so rare. I even tried to climb a tree just to see one up close! I was about half way up when I realized my mistake. I hugged a branch so tight and started to cry. I didn't think I could ever get down. Luckily, another Zaraden flew by and saw me. She decided to help me down! That was how we met.

I_tiny_feather.name: 小型羽毛
I_tiny_feather.memory: Zaraden wings are as varied as the colors of their skin. There are feathered wings, scaled wings, chitin wings, and more that I've never seen before. My feathers are hard chitin feathers, a common mutation among the wingless. She told me the little bulbs at the end are cute!

I_glow_wings.name: 发光羽翼
I_glow_wings.memory: Feathered wings are by far the most common type of Zaraden wings. They almost always come in a single pair, but some Zaraden can have up to three pairs of feathered wings.
I_glow_wings.card: 光耀防御+[VAL1]|L|羽毛射程上升

I_wingless.name: 无翼
I_wingless.memory: About 1 in 2048 Zaraden that are born to fully winged parents will turn out to be wingless. We have extremely little data on whether or not either parent being wingless has an effect on this chance. Very few wingless ever reach adulthood. But it doesn't have to be like this...|L||L|I always hated that term. They still have wings, but they just never fully developed.

I_webbed_wings.name: 网翼
I_webbed_wings.memory: Webbed wings are the rarest type of wings that Zaraden can have. They are usually able to fly the fastest too.

I_scale_wings.name: 麟翼
I_scale_wings.memory: Some Zaraden are born with patches of differently colored skin. These are quite rare and considered very beautiful.

I_chitin_wings.name: 几丁质翅翼
I_chitin_wings.memory: Chitin wings are strong, but very brittle. If any part of them is torn, it will take a much longer time to heal compared to the other types of wings.
I_chitin_wings.card: 毒素防御+[VAL1]|L|羽毛暴击伤害+[VAL2]%

I_lucky_feather.name: 幸运羽毛
I_lucky_feather.memory: All of her feathers are lucky feathers to me.

I_friendship.name: 友谊
I_friendship.memory: I lost it! I lost it! The necklace! The one we made with our feathers.|L|I had to get away...|L|I had to run...|L|I'll never see her beautiful feather again. I only have the memories now.

I_perfect_feather.name: 完美羽毛
I_perfect_feather.memory: I have a single feather that always grows in with the wrong color. I pluck it every time it grows back... and it always comes back.|L||L|But ever since I met HER, I just can't bring myself to pull it out anymore. Not everything has to be perfect.

I_neo_world.name: 新世界
I_neo_world.memory: That zaranoid creature from my dreams was trying to talk to me, but I couldn't understand a word it was saying. All Zaraden largely speak the same language now, but this doesn't sound like any of the dead languages we used in the past. It seems like this language is from another world entirely.|L||L|I'm so excited! I can hardly sleep!|L|...Which is making this a bit more difficult.
I_neo_world.card: 暴击羽毛|L|有着三倍射程|L|暴击率+[VAL2]%

I_real_wing.name: 真正羽翼
I_real_wing.memory: She picked me up and took me up into the air. She took me so high up that we could see the top of every tower! I looked down... but I wasn't scared. I was safe with her.

I_photon_sword.name: 光子之剑
I_photon_sword.memory: Oh no! One of my feathers fell off. I won't be able to take any good photographs for a few days. I need the light to reflect off of them in just the right way.|L||L|Be careful with it! They are sharper than they look.

I_shade_pendant.name: 暗影护符
I_shade_pendant.memory: That feather did belong to me. I try not to let them fall off in this dimension.|L||L|There will be repercussions for finding this. I am left with no other choice but to let you keep it.

I_flame_lance.name: 火炎之枪
I_flame_lance.memory: Oh |shake||nu||ze||nah||norm|!|L|It fell off right here? I have to be more careful. I don't want to burn down the whole |shake||nu||ze||nah||norm| forest!

I_spark_prism.name: 电弧棱镜
I_spark_prism.memory: Yes!|L|Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes.|L|Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes.|L|Prisma opened up to me!|L|I saw that cute little core.|L|She looked right at me!|L|I was so excited, some of my feathers fell right off.

I_poison_needle.name: 毒素之针
I_poison_needle.memory: Once they fall off, I can't control what they do anymore. They usually corrode anything they touch into a toxic liquid, but sometimes they just smell like flowers. I don't like those odds, so I usually keep my wings out of this dimension.|L||L|There was that one feather I gave to Scrambla. It turned things into soap. She REALLY wanted it for some reason.

I_rainbow.name: 彩虹
I_rainbow.memory: I can't wait until the day that I get to see one of these again. Even the most terrifying of storms end with a beautiful rainbow.
I_rainbow.card: 光耀羽毛|L|暴击率+[VAL2]%|L|暴击伤害+[VAL3]%

I_blizzard.name: 暴雪
I_blizzard.memory: These are the ideal conditions to draw out a void monster.|L||L|It's so COLD!|L|Of course, they send ME down here. I'm dispensable. I'd be living down here if I wasn't so "useful." But not useful enough it seems.
I_blizzard.card: 虚空羽毛|L|额外羽毛|L|伤害+[VAL3]

I_wildfire.name: 野火
I_wildfire.memory: The Prisma unit went berserk again. Just when I thought I could begin to understand these machines, they do something like this. Why were they built this way? It is completely irrational.
I_wildfire.card: 燃烧羽毛|L|羽毛伤害+[VAL2]|L|羽毛射速-[VAL4]

I_storm.name: 风暴
I_storm.memory: It's just noise.|L|It can't hurt me.|L|It's just noise.|L|It can't hurt me.|L|It's just noise.|L|It can't hurt me.|L|THAT was a loud one!
I_storm.card: 电击羽毛|L|额外羽毛|L|射程上升

I_acid_rain.name: 酸雨
I_acid_rain.memory: What if it rained like this in Iiry? For everything we've done, we would deserve it. I would not fight it. I don't have anyone left anyways. I would be with her again.|L||L|Cleanse us, acid rain!

I_spectrum.name: 光谱
I_spectrum.memory: The arrangement of light cells in the eyes of each Zaraden is slightly varied. That means that we all perceive color a little bit differently. If we could switch eyes, how much different would the world look?
I_spectrum.card: 羽毛子弹|L|变为各种元素！|L|羽毛射速+[VAL2]

I_starspur.name: 星刺
I_starspur.memory: These spiky plants look pretty, but do not touch them! They will stick to you and they will hurt when you try to pull them out.

I_falling_star.name: 落星
I_falling_star.memory: I wish I could see her again.|L|I wish I could fly.

I_shooting_star.name: 流星
I_shooting_star.memory: I wish she could fly.|L|I wish I could see her again.

I_star_mite.name: 星的跳虫
I_star_mite.memory: Sometimes I'll see a tree full of star mites. The little spots glow like stars all over the tree. It reminds me of the night sky. At least how it used to be... before the rain.

I_violence.name: 暴力
I_violence.memory: If love and friendship can't solve it, then a little violence will get the job done!

I_star_shower.name: 流星雨
I_star_shower.memory: Don't worry, those are just little pebbles falling from space. If a real star fell down to Eyeris, we would all be vaporized instantly.

I_spectral_bloom.name: 星界之花
I_spectral_bloom.memory: These beautiful flowers can actually grow shiny pebbles inside them!
I_spectral_bloom.card: 光耀防御+[VAL1]|L|星星射速条|L|时间-[VAL2]%

I_night_bloom.name: 暗夜之花
I_night_bloom.memory: These flowers will only bloom when moonlight shines on them. Normally they would close again during the day, but they stay open when it rains in the morning. Or all day...
I_night_bloom.card: 虚空防御+[VAL1]|L|最小星星射速+[VAL2]

I_day_bloom.name: 白昼之花
I_day_bloom.memory: These flowers only bloom in the daylight. I have not seen one bloom in a long time.
I_day_bloom.card: 燃烧防御+[VAL1]|L|星星暴击伤害+[VAL2]%

I_shock_bloom.name: 电涌之花
I_shock_bloom.memory: These flowers cause a mild tingling feeling when you touch them. They also stick to magnets.
I_shock_bloom.card: 电击防御+[VAL1]|L|最大星星射速+[VAL2]

I_gloom_bloom.name: 幽暗之花
I_gloom_bloom.memory: These flowers will cause sadness for a few minutes when you touch them. Uncontrollable tears will come out of your eyes.|L||L|I probably shoudn't go near them, but they might be so lonely!

I_photon_wave.name: 光子波
I_photon_wave.memory: The photons reflecting off your body are composing such an appealing image in my eyes.|L||L|I can't believe I said this to her! What was I thinking?!
I_photon_wave.card: 波状星星子弹|L|星星伤害+[VAL2]

I_arrow.name: 箭矢
I_arrow.memory: Now this is an interesting find.|L||L|This must have been down here for hundreds of years. Since even before these towers.

I_barrage.name: 箭雨
I_barrage.memory: My sister isn't feeling well today. She is going to need an inescapable hug and about 2,000 kisses right now!

I_rock_star.name: 摇滚之星
I_rock_star.memory: I'm going to crumble those towers with nothing but the power of this righteous metal. Monsters are a better audience anyways!
I_rock_star.card: 星星射速条|L|下降更慢|L|星星伤害+[VAL2]

I_crying_effect.name: 啜泣效应
I_crying_effect.memory: Every time I stop and think to myself, I start crying again. It just won't stop. What is wrong with me?

I_platinum_star.name: 白金之星
I_platinum_star.memory: If you ever run into trouble and you don't know what else you can do, I have a special technique for such occasions. You quickly move one leg forward. Then the other one. Repeat until you are very far away from the situation.|L||L|Works every time!
I_platinum_star.card: 星星子弹快而精准|L|射速条-[VAL1]%

I_glow_candy.name: 发光糖果
I_glow_candy.memory: Calorie really surprised me with these candies. They are very sweet! She got these from another world where it's always night time and cold. She likes to go there to cool off.|L||L|I had assumed that all fire monsters would like hot and spicy flavors, but I was completely wrong. I'm not sure why I thought that in the first place.

I_void_candy.name: 虚空糖果
I_void_candy.memory: Amalga pulled this thing out of another universe. She says it's the sweetest thing that she's ever tasted. I don't know how she convinced me to try it, but it tasted like absolutely nothing to me.

I_spicy_candy.name: 辣味糖果
I_spicy_candy.memory: Boiler found this in that infinite fire dimension she's always talking about, but I don't think these are supposed to be candy. We put one in water so that I could try one without the fire, but it just stayed on fire.

I_pop_candy.name: 霹雳糖果
I_pop_candy.memory: Joule made these candies! These are fun because they pop and shock your tongue lightly.|L|She told me that she toned down the effect on mine though. I'm glad she did, because I can see sparks flying out of her mouth when she eats them.

I_bitter_candy.name: 苦味糖果
I_bitter_candy.memory: Scrambla loves to eat these, but I don't know how to tell her that they are actually pieces of soap.

I_rainbow_star.name: 彩虹之星
I_rainbow_star.memory: Rainbow stars are one of the most common type of star in the universe. This includes our own star, Xaila. They are massive enough to constantly fuse the irium atoms in their core into sherium. They emit a rainbow of light, but of course the atmosphere of our planet interferes with these colors.
I_rainbow_star.card: 光耀之星|L|最小射速+[VAL2]|L|射速条-[VAL3]%

I_shiver_star.name: 颤栗之星
I_shiver_star.memory: A shiver star is a star that has burnt out. They no longer have any fuel to burn through and are in the process of cooling down. They may eventually turn dark, but our universe is not old enough to have any dark shiver stars.
I_shiver_star.card: 虚空之星|L|最大射速+[VAL2]|L|最小射速-[VAL3]

I_burning_star.name: 燃烧之星
I_burning_star.memory: After a rainbow star has fused all of its irium into sherium, it will begin to burn through that sherium. The star will grow massive and red.
I_burning_star.card: 燃烧之星|L|暴击率+[VAL2]%|L|暴击伤害+[VAL3]%

I_nova_star.name: 新星
I_nova_star.memory: When a large enough burning star has finished burning through its fuel, it will collapse into itself and create a nova explosion. It will blast brightly colored gas clouds in all directions.
I_nova_star.card: 电击之星|L|最大射速+[VAL2]|L|射速条-[VAL3]%

I_protostar.name: 原恒星
I_protostar.memory: A protostar is a large collection of gas that might eventually collapse down and form a new star.
I_protostar.card: 毒素之星|L|星星伤害+[VAL2]|L|星星散射-[VAL3]%

I_wrath_of_pride.name: 骄傲怒火
I_wrath_of_pride.memory: They took my friend away from me all those years ago. They lied to me about her!|L||L|I don't care what I'm supposed to be. I don't care what they call me! If loving my wingless friend makes me The Devil, then so be it!
I_wrath_of_pride.card: 星星子弹|L|变为各种元素！|L|最大射速+[VAL2]

I_heart_stone.name: 心型石
I_heart_stone.memory: These stones are created by all Eyeric Glyphs. They are believed to be made of the same material as the Glyphs themselves. It is not known why they create these, but they are always in the shape of a heart.|L||L|Glyph monsters will guard their heart stones for a few days after creating them. They DO NOT like it when another living thing touches their heart stone during this time.

I_null_stone.name: 空无石
I_null_stone.memory: This stone is created by Eyeric Glyphs of void elements. Newly created stones can absorb all of the thermal energy from anything that touches them, but they lose this ability after a few days. Within the first 20 hours of creation, this effect is powerful enough to cause frostbite in only 30 seconds.

I_heat_stone.name: 热量石
I_heat_stone.memory: This stone is created by Eyeric Glyphs of volatile elements. These will emit temperatures of over 3000 Sohradra. It is powerful enough to ignite objects within a 10 lidra radius. That may seem small, but the fire can easily spread. This effect will wear off after a few days, but the stone will always be warm.

I_spark_stone.name: 电弧石
I_spark_stone.memory: This stone is created by Eyeric Glyphs of energetic elements. They are incredibly useful for their ability to conduct electricity. However, gathering them is quite dangerous. Not only can they easily electrocute a Zaraden, but Glyph monsters will react violently toward anything that touches them.

I_blight_stone.name: 灾厄石
I_blight_stone.memory: This stone is created by Eyeric Glyphs of toxic elements. These will emit a deadly toxin into the air for several days. Even after that effect wears off, the stone itself will always be corrosive to most living things.

I_split_unit.name: 分裂单元
I_split_unit.memory: It's been another day of searching The Pit. I found another small deactivated Zaramech unit down there. I've decided to bring this one back with me.
I_split_unit.card: 发射双重|L|电击子弹的帮手

I_inverted_unit.name: 反转单元
I_inverted_unit.memory: I've been tinkering with those deactivated Zaramechs I found in The Pit. I'm getting closer to figuring out how to activate them.
I_inverted_unit.card: 向后发射|L|电击子弹的帮手

I_blank_photo.name: 空白照片
I_blank_photo.memory: I found an unusual heart stone hidden under a particularly large mushroom. This stone was completely transparent. I'd never seen any like it before, but after what happened last time, I didn't dare to touch it.|L||L|I can't help but wonder if communicating with those Glyphs is possible.
I_blank_photo.card: 你的第一发蓄力射击|L|会创造一个帮手

I_mite_den.name: 跳虫巢穴
I_mite_den.memory: I used to be so afraid of mites. They can jump so high, move so fast, and I will freak out when they try to land on me. My sister loves them though. She wouldn't mind having a hundred mites crawling all over her.|L||L|I still get startled by them sometimes, but I have learned to love them too!
I_mite_den.card: 你的连击最多可以吸引|L|[VAL2]个 跳虫帮手

I_petrichor.name: 芳香
I_petrichor.memory: Something about the rain gets all of these monsters worked up. Even the smell of rain causes monster activity to rise.

I_blue_hug.name: 蓝色拥抱
I_blue_hug.memory: I will never let Mother take her heart. She needs her heart. She is perfect like this.|L||L|But what about those other Zaraden? I have brought many others to Mother. I have been most imperfect...
I_blue_hug.card: 帮手们距离彼此更近|L|帮手伤害+[VAL2]%

I_all_stone.name: 全能石
I_all_stone.memory: I saw two Glyphs fighting each other. Fire and ice blasts were flying across the sky. It looked as though the fire one was winning.|L|Then something amazing happened! They both formed a body! A Zaraden-like body! I didn't know they could do that! The Fire Glyph created the most beautiful stone that I had ever seen. She made it out of nothing but air and then she gave it to the Ice Glyph. They both looked so happy.
I_all_stone.card: 随连击变强的|L|全元素帮手

I_broken_heart.name: 破碎的心
I_broken_heart.memory: I trust you with this. Please help me put it back together.
I_broken_heart.card: 这个帮手|L|会在战斗中变强

I_cross_twin.name: 交叉双子
I_cross_twin.memory: It's really simple. I'll explain it again.|L||L|Her mother is my father and my mother is her father. We were born on the same day.|L||L|We are cross twins.
I_cross_twin.card: 在你受伤或恐慌后|L|会攻击的帮手

I_flip_flapped.name: 噼啪啦
I_flip_flapped.memory: I've done it! One of the units came to life and it somehow activated another one I had brought with me. They were both immediately hostile, but I had planned for this by removing their firing mechanisms.|L||L|I finally got them both to calm down by humming a song I know. They just follow me around now.
I_flip_flapped.card: 分裂单元|L|反转单元|L|帮手伤害+[VAL5]%

I_scrambla_maw.name: 蛋花之口
I_scrambla_maw.memory: Hello space alien!|L|You can read our memories here so we remembered to remember to say dis.|L||L|We love you!
I_scrambla_maw.card: 破坏部位|L|可以增强这个帮手

I_boiler_maw.name: 锅炉之口
I_boiler_maw.memory: Dis spicy will help you, yis?|L|If anything hurts you, we will apply extra spice to dis situation!
I_boiler_maw.card: 受到伤害|L|可以增强这个帮手

I_captured_stars.name: 星星摄影
I_captured_stars.memory: Photoxai! Photoxai!!|L||L|Please, I need you to teach me how you do this! How did you make these? It's for science!!|L||L|Ugh! She's gone...

I_misfit_heart.name: 不合之心
I_misfit_heart.memory: So many broken hearts out there don't belong.|L|If we all come together,|L|We can be each other's missing pieces.
I_misfit_heart.card: 恐慌或受到伤害|L|来获得环绕帮手

I_umbrella.name: 雨伞
I_umbrella.memory: Imagine a normal Zaraden giving a gift to a wingless. I know it sounds absurd, but I remember when she gave me this umbrella. I told her that I didn't want it. I didn't think I deserved anything. I'll never forget what she told me.|L||L|"You deserve to be loved, just like everyone else."

I_fallen_angel.name: 坠落天使
I_fallen_angel.memory: The image is seared into my memory forever. A Zaraden with perfectly healthy wings down here on the ground. I called out to her, but I knew there would be no response. I knew she let herself fall.|L||L|I wish I could somehow be there to catch her. I wish I could be there to catch them all. No one deserves to be down here.

I_mite_cuddle.name: 跳虫拥抱
I_mite_cuddle.memory: |wave|Who's a good girl?|L|Who's my little orb?|L|Who's a squishy little orb?|L|Why are you so cute?!|L|Mwah Mwah Mwah
I_mite_cuddle.card: 吸引最多|L|[VAL2]个跳虫帮手|L|帮手伤害+[VAL4]%

I_magnetic_charm.name: 磁力护符
I_magnetic_charm.memory: I know what my sister wants more than anything else, but the problem is she wouldn't recognize flirting if it was a physical object being thrown at her.|L||L|No, that's not it. She's just convinced herself that it can't possibly happen to her.
I_magnetic_charm.card: 造成伤害或破坏部位|L|以吸引[VAL1]个帮手

I_everyone.name: 大家
I_everyone.memory: Join us, everyone. So we can all be nothing together.

I_bracelet.name: 手镯
I_bracelet.memory: It's such a cute band to wear around your leg. Although I'm not sure I could get used to having something like this constantly touching my skin.
I_bracelet.card: 帮手会环绕在你身边|L|[VAL3]个光耀帮手

I_despair.name: 绝望
I_despair.memory: I only used to feel one thing, but that moment changed me forever. Who knew that one single moment could have such an impact.
I_despair.card: [VAL2]个蓝色帮手|L|全连击会给你更多！

I_friend_spiral.name: 友谊螺旋
I_friend_spiral.memory: I found a new friend. We've actually been right next to each other for so long, but there was a wall between us. We could not see each other. We could not interact. That is, until I created the device.
